title: Blizzards!
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 749 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 830L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and L
description: With winds gusting over 35 miles per hour, blinding snow, and biting wind chill, the best place to be during a blizzard is inside! Blizzards! provides students with a comprehensive look at the causes and effects of these powerful winter storms. Detailed photographs and simple sentences support young readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing as well as the proper use of antonyms in sentences. The book and lesson are also available for levels I and L.
highFrequencyWords: air pressure, biting, blizzard, dangerous, frostbite, gales, hurricane, whiteout, wind chill
